QuestData.Title: Unyielding Souls
QuestData.Description: Near the end of our invasion, the Armory to the south fell under attack by the Horde's insidious Death Knights. Those vile shades cursed the Armory's defenders - and trapped their souls between the realms of the living and the dead.$B$BThose noble souls must be set free! I beg you, $n, end my comrades' torment, for I have not the heart to slay them myself.
QuestData.LogDescription: Honor Guard Wesilow wants you to defeat 12 Unyielding Footmen, 10 Unyielding Sorcerers, and 5 Unyielding Knights at the Expedition Armory to the south.
QuestData.CompletionText: What I asked of you is a terrible thing to request of anyone. But what you must understand is many of the men won't go near the ruins. The memories and the pain are too fresh, but we can't allow the spirits to continue to wander.$B$BThe longer they persist, the more they shed their remaining ties to their past life and give themselves over to malevolence.
QuestData.RewardText: The Sons appreciate your efforts, even if few are willing to speak of the armory.
